style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.23%;top: 6.94%;width: 8.95%;height: 6.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ドン・チョンマゲ
タタラトゥスに住む
世界一有名な
吸血鬼シェフ。
彼と同じ調理法さ
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 28.46%;top: 3.26%;width: 15.75%;height: 9.97%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
言い換えると、
吸血鬼が消化しやすい
素材を使いつつも
他種族の悪魔にも
美味い料理を作る
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 70.58%;top: 4.93%;width: 19.09%;height: 10.31%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
いつか弟子に
なりたいから
２，３教えを
請えるといいな
style: font-size: 15px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.96%;top: 36.53%;width: 16.83%;height: 8.30%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
料理のことには
うるさいんだよ。
黙らないなら
お前らみたいな
オタクになれよ
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 42.18%;top: 35.44%;width: 15.04%;height: 11.32%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ぼくは
君達みたいな
イケメンの
仲間入りって
こと?
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.61%;top: 36.78%;width: 13.84%;height: 8.97%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text: それと…ヨッと!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 73.81%;top: 39.38%;width: 9.43%;height: 4.11%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:50%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ニモの鞄の
奥深くに
隠された
性癖は何かな!
style: font-size: 15px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.96%;top: 66.12%;width: 17.54%;height: 7.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ニャんじゃこりゃ!
生首!
style: font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 30.97%;top: 65.70%;width: 25.66%;height: 7.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: bold;
